tester: MCP_DOCKER Tools - Best Builder in the World

details.accessGuards: ✅ Denies cross-org access and logs AuditLog

details.sidebar: ✅ Overview, Orgs, Demos, Orders, Subscriptions, Projects, Tickets, Usage & Webhooks, Feature Flags, Settings
details.topBar: ✅ Search, Org switcher, Notifications, User menu

details.filters: ✅ Active sub / Past-due / No sub filters
details.overviewTab: ✅ Subscription snapshot, onboarding progress, recent activity
details.quickActions: ✅ Send Welcome + View Portal as Client

details.markPaid: ✅ Creates Payment, flips Invoice to PAID, posts Notification, writes AuditLog
details.pdfGeneration: ✅ Generate PDF sets pdfUrl; Download PDF works if present

details.taskManagement: ✅ Assign/unassign, due date, toggle done; events logged

details.svdLinks: ✅ Opens SVD via short-lived link in new tab
details.noLocalStorage: ✅ No local blob storage found in network/DB

details.statusChanges: ✅ Status/priority changes notify requester; audit logged

details.usageChart: ✅ Shows events by key over time
details.featureFlags: ✅ List (key, enabled, source); OWNER/ADMIN only toggle; audit logged

details.timeline: ✅ Shows lead → demo → convert → order → invoice → emails
details.convertWizard: ✅ Creates Org + Sub + Order + Invoice + Onboarding Project; seeds FeatureFlags/LeadFlow/IndustryIQ

details.orgMembership: ✅ Client sees only orgs where they're a member; org picker appears if multiple

details.overview: ✅ Shows org name, subscription snapshot, onboarding %, 5 latest docs, latest invoice, activity stream
details.onboarding: ✅ Lists tasks; client can complete client-assigned tasks; SVD upload link opens correctly
details.documents: ✅ SecureDoc list filters; short-lived links open SVD
details.billing: ✅ Invoices visible; PAID invoices download PDF (if pdfUrl exists); unpaid shows tooltip
details.support: ✅ Client can open a ticket, comment, attach via SVD; staff see it in Admin
details.profile: ✅ Update name + email notification prefs persist

details.dataIsolation: ✅ No internal data visible in portal
